name: Ov Sulfur
description: '''Ov Sulfur''' is an American [[deathcore]] band formed in 2020 in [[Las Vegas, Nevada]]. The band's lineup currently consists of vocalist Ricky Hoover, guitarist and vocalist Chase Wilson, guitarist Christian Becker, bassist Josh Bearden and drummer Ryan "Leviathvn" Rivard. The band has released only one studio album titled ''[[The Burden ov Faith|The Burden Ov Faith]]'', which was released on March 24, 2023 through [[Century Media Records]] and one EP. The band is known for their very anti-religious lyrical themes.
